summary: A New Companion for your follower legion pleasure
descriptionHtml:
Shazza Myason is a lovley Breton lass that that has come to help your dragonborn out in their time of need.

Shazza is level 50 and hangs around the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. If your lowbie and want some bang, look no further

Compatible with the following Mods!
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11770/?]Let's Get Naked[/url]﻿
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10748/?]Animated Prostiution[/url]﻿
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My home is Your Home[/url]﻿
See: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Body Edition[/url]

Note: YOU DO NOT NEED THE ABOVE MODS TO MAKE IT WORK! Their Optional if you play that route!

I do belive you can marry her as well if you have the Amulet of Mara, but ive yet to test her on that as my dragonborn is married, but please let me know if that happens.

So please download Shazza in to your Adventures and enjoy her company today!

Please let me know if theres any issues and ill do my best to fix the problem

Props to Grathagis from the Steam Community Workshop for providing advice on making this mod!

1.1 Update:
*Fixed a Skin Issue
*Changed her voice as it sounded like Lydia's she now has a sultry voice
author: Romire

files.name: Shazza Myason 1.1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed Skin Issue and Changed her Voice
